original_text: He must wash his body in a holy place. He must put on his own clothes. He must leave the holy place. Then he must sacrifice the burnt offerings. They will make atonement for himself and for the people.
korean_text: 거룩한 곳에서 물로 그의 몸을 씻고 자기 옷을 입고 나와서 자기의 번제와 백성의 번제를 드려 자기와 백성을 위하여 속죄하고

sentences.original_text: He must wash his body in a holy place.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 거룩한 곳에서 자기 몸을 씻어야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: He must put on his own clothes.
He must leave the holy place.
Then he must sacrifice the burnt offerings.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나서 그는 번제물을 드려야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: They will make atonement for himself.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들은 그를 위해 속죄를 할 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: They will make atonement for the people.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들은 백성을 위해 속죄를 할 것입니다.
